metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12967 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The getsym function in tekhex.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library(aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer over-read and applicationcrash) via a malformed tekhex binary.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
